description: Blend functions that define how colors from previous and current frame are mixed.

linear.description: Linearly blends the current frame's color with the previous frame's color based on an alpha value.

params.name: alpha
params.description:
Alpha value for linear blending.
Higher values give more influence to the current frame.

additive.description: Adds the current frame's color to the previous frame's color, scaled by an alpha value.

params.name: alpha
params.description:
Alpha value for additive blending.
Higher values increase the current frame's influence.

sigmoid.description: Blends colors from the current frame using a sigmoid function for contrast control, influenced by the previous frame's luminance.

params.name: alpha
params.description: Base alpha value for sigmoid blending.

params.name: steepness
params.description:
Steepness of the sigmoid function.
Higher values create a steeper curve.

params.name: midpoint
params.description:
Midpoint of the sigmoid function.
Adjusts the central point of the curve.
